※この部門にはネタプレイリプを2つ登録している形ですがよろしいですよね？
Extra RTA 8:11くらい

This stage is very hard to optimize. A lot of enemies drop extra items when you kill them immediately, with very tight timings for mallets and rice. Tsukasa midboss is deceptively annoying, and Momoyo really likes killing runs. Momoyo 1st and 8th spells in particular are the biggest walls in a run. The longer they go on, the more likely they will kill you, in very painful ways. 7.5b possible if you mallet 8th spell for a 3rd time, but at the moment this feels impossible. GG.
